text: - One-two, one-two, one-two... - To Tadahiro Amatsu.
Dear Hiro, we've only just begun our intensive priestess retreat.
But I think... well, Kurako is taking this intensive thing way too seriously!
We're training super-hard every day and she always demands more!
She's a cold, heartless monster!
But then, once we're done with our training in the morning,
[Excited laughter]
we can do whatever we want for the rest of the day!
[Playful giggles, excited laughter]
- Gotcha! - Hey, no fair!
Anyway, I'm having a great time!
Write back soon, okay?
They're not improving fast enough.
Training seems to have no impact.
They're not doing any better.
They have no drive.
Maybe because they're such good friends.
Huh?
[Distant shouting]
Nothing will ever improve if they keep playing all the time.
What am I going to do?
[Exhausted sigh] I'm so tired!
[Embarassed gasp]
I guess the only thing that could make this better is if Hiro had come, too.
What's with her?
Don't tell me she's homesick already, guys.
We haven't been here that long.
But her sisters are all here.
Do you know what it is, Tama?
Mm-mm.
Maybe it's...
Oh!
I know what it is! I bet she's just sad that we left Hiro behind.
That's it! That's gotta be it!
This is the best summer of her whole life
and all she can think about is him, miles and miles away.
I know how she feels.
And what if, while we were here...
...there were some new developments?
Oh no, that would be awful!
Win some, lose some.
Huh? What are you talking about?
Oh, if something were to happen, Yuzu would never get over it.
Yeah, I know. She can really hold a grudge.
She's rude.
She's got no boobs.
Hey, girls, I think as members of the Priestess Club,
we should help our clueless leader out.
By doing what?
Don't you get it?!
We're gonna teach Yuzu how to make Hiro burn with love for her!
And how do you intend to do that?
First, we're gonna have to make Yuzu a little more ladylike.
Oh, this is gonna be so much fun!
- Come on, slowpoke! - Wait for me!
Yuzu, shall we have some tea?
Sure, Shizuka. I was thinking I wanted a nice frosty drink.
Huh?
What are you doing?!
When it's hot out, it's best to drink a hot drink.
- Please, have some. - Um... Uh...
Okay...
Thank you.
Oh!
No, Yuzu!
That hurt!
Hey, what'd you do that for?!
When having tea, you must always sit properly.
- Like this. - Ow!
You must prop up the bowl with your right
hand and place your left on the bottom.
After you bow to the tea, turn the bowl 90 degress with your right hand
and then you may take one sip.
You must bow once more and compliment the host on the tea.
Then you drink the tea in small sips.
I think you got a little too much sun today, Shizuka.
Why are you giving me this whole lecture about tea ceremony at the beach anyway?
I mean, who cares?
The tea ceremony is important to Japanese women.
See? They are all doing it properly.
Even at the beach.
Huh? [Shocked gasp]
Nuh-uh! No way! I can't do this!
Let me outta here!
I want a cold soda!
No! Wait, Yuzu!
[Satisfied gasp] That's so much better than tea!
Now that I have my second wind, I think I'll go for another swim.
- Don't move a muscle, Yuzu! - Huh?
I am now concentrating all the energy of
the universe into the rocks under your feet!
It will go into you and increase your charms, fulfilling all your love wishes.
I now call on the beautiful Venus.
Invest our coolest friend here with your mysterious powers!
- Um, what are you doing? - Come! You are needed! Come now!
I call upon you, beautiful Venus!
- This is so wrong. We need to stop her. - Venus! Where are you?!
Venus, come to me now!
Right. What are you doing now?
Do we really have to go souvenir shopping right now?
I really wanna go swimming.
Too hot...
[Frustrated groan]
This'll be the real life lesson.
It's like she's on a date with Chika.
I think this is my best idea yet.
I don't know. Are you sure?
I can't stand it! She's so cute!
What do you think?
What is that?
How's this one?
No good.
It smells.
Tentacles?
[Frustrated growl]
Already have one.
Come on, Chika! Just make a decision!
Oh, I can't stand it anymore!
Oh...
Please, oh, please turn down the gifts I choose, too!
I really don't need this.
None of these ideas are working.
Especially with Izumi around.
All right, I guess it's up to me then!
Oh, finally!
Perfect, Seiko. You'll give Yuzu a great lesson in love.
Huh? You're gonna give me a love lesson?
Of course. It's just what you need.
Listen up, Yuzu!
I'm going to let you in on a little secret.
The only way to a man's heart is...
Uh...
Oh, what am I talking about?! I don't know!
I'm a failure!
I'm in the Guinness Book for number of heartbreaks!
I'll never find anyone!
There, there.
My love life's a wreck! Why should I be looking out for yours?!
Yuzu! You should be happy you have someone!
- Some of us are gonna die alone! - Oh, Seiko! Please don't cry!
You guys are acting really funny today.
Come on, Tama, fess up! What's going on?!
But Yuzu, I just wanted to help.
You looked so sad and... and they said it was an emergency, so, um...
What?!
They told me it would help you and Hiro. So...
Huh?
They said for him to start really liking you, you just have to act more ladylike.
That's all.
Thanks a lot, you guys!
[Sigh]
So that's why.
Thanks for the help, you guys.
But... that's really none of your business!
I leave them alone and they stay out till all hours.
They'll be useless tomorrow.
Am I going to have to start training them at night, too?
No, that's no good!
You need more power!
Come on, take a deep breath!
Once more!
...morning mist, hear the call of your humble servant.
We appeal for your assistance. Exorcise the
evil that has come from the Netherworld...
You have to be louder!
Please, Yuzu...
No more!
[Exhausted panting]
Yeah, Yuzu, come on. Don't you think you've punished us enough?
We were just trying to help!
I know. And I really appreciate all your help.
And so I just wanted to help you, okay?
Uh...
I thought the best way to return the favor was to help you with your training!
Thanks, Yuzu.
Come on, let's try again, and this time, put your heart in it!
Let's go!
We are gathered together. We are asking you to aid us in our quest.
I guess things aren't really so bad after all.
...bring chaos to...
Dear Hiro,
Write back soon. I wish you were here.
But anyway, I'm having a great time!
